```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
d<-read.csv("TrainingData/TrainingData.csv",header=F)
```

# Number of classes
```{r}
length(unique(d$V2))
```

# How many images of each class

```{r}
sort(table(d$V2))
```

```{r}
write.table(sort(unique(d$V2)),"cloudML/dict.txt",sep="\n",quote=F)
```

We are looking for about 200 images per class.
